p.s: Corroborate
The witnesses corroborated the policeman's testimony.
The witnesses corroborated the policeman's testimony.
The witnesses corroborated the policeman's testimony.

p.ru: Открывать, раскрывать, снимать покрывало, предстать в истинном свете
p.s: Unveil
The club has unveiled plans to build a new stadium.
The club has unveiled plans to build a new stadium.
The club has unveiled plans to build a new stadium.

p.ru: Завеса, вуаль, покрывало, покров, фата, завуалировать, скрывать, вуалировать
p.s: Veil
The sun was veiled by clouds.
The sun was veiled by clouds.
The sun was veiled by clouds.
Women are forbidden from going out without a veil.
Women are forbidden from going out without a veil.
Women are forbidden from going out without a veil.

p.ru: Выплата, оплата, расходы, издержки, выплаченная сумма
p.s: Disbursement
Another drew attention to the fact that disbursement of aid has often been delayed.
Another drew attention to the fact that disbursement of aid has often been delayed.
Another drew attention to the fact that disbursement of aid has often been delayed.

p.ru: Посягать, сталкиваться, ударяться, нарушать, вторгаться, покушаться
p.s: Impinge
This impinges on my rights as a citizen.
This impinges on my rights as a citizen.
This impinges on my rights as a citizen.

p.ru: Запрос, расследование, дознание, спрос, вопрос, исследование, справка, следствие
p.s: Inquiry
He got a quick reply to his inquiry.
He got a quick reply to his inquiry.
He got a quick reply to his inquiry.
Voluntarily
Susan worked in the studios voluntarily, to gain experience.
Susan worked in the studios voluntarily, to gain experience.
Susan worked in the studios voluntarily, to gain experience.

p.ru: Ходатайствовать, просить, требовать, выпрашивать, хлопотать, подстрекать, умолять
p.s: Solicit
Therefore we do not solicit or give advice without explicit consent.
Therefore we do not solicit or give advice without explicit consent.
Therefore we do not solicit or give advice without explicit consent.
Deem
The president has authority to take actions he deems appropriate.
The president has authority to take actions he deems appropriate.
The president has authority to take actions he deems appropriate.

p.ru: Относиться, принадлежать, иметь отношение, быть свойственным, подходить
p.s: Pertain
The statistics found in the study pertain to the relationship between coffee drinking and poor sleep habits.
The statistics found in the study pertain to the relationship between coffee drinking and poor sleep habits.
